name: Glorious PC Gaming Race Model D
description: Model D Wireless has the lowest wireless latency of any mouse in its class. The state-of-the-industry technology provides responsive, crisp clicks and no unexpected double-clicking.

name: Logitech G502 Lightspeed Wireless
description: Game faster and more accurately with G502 LIGHTSPEED. Enter the iconic gaming mouse from Logitech G now with superfast LIGHTSPEED wireless, redesigned internals, and POWERPLAY compatibility.

name: Razer Viper Ultimate Gaming Mouse
description: Made to perform better than any wireless technology, the low latency delivers high-speed transmission to register swipes and clicks instantaneously. Its also highly adaptive, able to switch seamlessly between frequencies to maintain peak stability, allowing you the freedom to compete at your best.

name: Logitech MX Master 3
description: MX Master 3 is instant precision and infinite potential. Its the most advanced Master Series mouse yet, designed for creatives and engineered for coders. If you can think it, you can master it.

name: Logitech g600 MMO Gaming Mouse
description: With 20 buttons, the Logitech G600 MMO Gaming Mouse is the most customizable and easy-to-use mouse specifically designed for mastering your favorite MMOs

name: Logitech G513 Gaming Keyboard
description: G513 is a high performance LIGHTSYNC RGB mechanical gaming keyboard with choice of mechanical key switches and USB pass-through in a modern and sleek design

name: Razer BlackWidow V3 Gaming Keyboard
description: The name that started it all returns to reassert its dominance. Feel the difference with the Razer BlackWidow V3, backed by a legacy as the first and most iconic mechanical gaming keyboard, and armed with new, improved features including our world-renowned switches.

name: Corsair K100 Gaming Keyboard
description: The incomparable CORSAIR K100 RGB Optical-Mechanical Gaming Keyboard combines stunning aluminum design with per-key RGB lighting and a 44-zone LightEdge.

name: Logitech MX Keys
description: Introducing MX Keys, an advanced wireless illuminated keyboard featuring Perfect Stroke keys shaped for your fingertips, smart illumination, and a remarkably solid build

name: MacAlly Mini USB C Keyboard
description: Supports USB-C enabled computers, iPad Pro and Android devices. Compatible with USB-C equipped Chromebooks 78 full size thin keycaps for a comfortable and efficient typing experience 13 convenient shortcut keys for one-touch control of Mac applications.

name: HyperX Cloud II Wireless Gaming Headset
description: The HyperX Cloud II was built to be an ultra-comfortable gaming headset. As millions continue to utilize it as their preferred gaming headset, we proudly present the HyperX Cloud II Wireless.

name: Corsair Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Immerse yourself in the action with the CORSAIR VOID RGB ELITE Wireless, with custom-tuned 50mm neodymium audio drivers delivering 7.1 surround sound on PC. Microfiber mesh fabric and memory foam earpads provide lasting comfort.

name: Logitech G432 Wired Gaming Headset
description: With the G432 gaming headset, be surrounded by the game environment. Get the thrill of being fully immersed in the action and always heard for a complete gaming experience.

name: Logitech G PRO X Wireless Gaming Headset
description: LIGHTSPEED wireless technology, only from Logitech G, lets you game wirelessly without compromises in latency, connectivity or battery. Play in complete freedom with 20+ hours battery life and up to 15 m range using robust 2.4 GHz frequency.

name: Razer Barracuda X Wireless Gaming Headset
description: Immersive home gaming, seamless on-the-go audio, the Razer Barracuda X is built for both. Designed for multi-platform gaming and mobile entertainment, this 4-in-1 USB-C wireless headset offers true versatility and freedom backed by long-lasting comfort, powerful drivers, and a crystal-clear mic.
